entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`task_id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `project_id` INTEGER NOT NULL, `name` TEXT NOT NULL, `timestamp` INTEGER NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY(`project_id`) REFERENCES `Project`(`project_id`) ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE NO ACTION )

indices.name: index_Task_task_id
